vi: It has already been a week.

en: Tuan Awang, ada wartawan telefon tadi.
vi: Sir Awang, a reporter called just now.

en: Tentang rahsia kejayaan kedudukan percubaan SBP kita.
vi: About the secret to the success of our SBP Trial ranking.

en: Jadi apa kisah antara kau dan Aaidaa?
vi: So what's the story between you and Aaidaa?

en: Aku tak tahu nak cakap apa, Botol.
vi: I don't know what to say, Botol.

en: Hayati pula? Kau nak beri dia kepada aku?
vi: You don't know? What about Yati?

Are you giving her to me?
 Yati was not my girlfriend.

en: Bercakap tentang Hilmi, kenapa dia tak ikut kita?
vi: Speaking of Hilmi, why isn't he here with us?

en: Dia tahu tentang kau dan Aaidaa?
vi: Does he know about you and Aaidaa?

en: - Tak, giliran kau pula. - Kau kena beritahu dia.

vi:
You have to tell him.
 I'm sick of you two.
SPM is in a few weeks.
I've never felt this way before.

en: Aku tak tahu, ada yang tak kena.
vi: I don't know. Something's not right.

en: Siapa yang buat silap? Mesti Amy.
vi: Who messed up? It must be Amy.
Hey, no. You guys were okay.

en: Kamu dah buat dengan baik, cuma…
kita berada di sini selama lima tahun.
vi: we've been here for five years.

en: Susah nak percaya kalau bukan sebab tempat ini,
vi: It's hard to believe that if it's not for this place,

en: Kau jatuh di mana hari itu?
vi: Where did you fall the other day?
It's okay, it's just my foot.

en: Kami fikir untuk majlis makan malam nanti,
vi: My band and I decided that for dinner night,
you have to sing with me.

en: Hei, suara kau merdu hari itu.
vi: You have such a good voice.
That was in front of strangers.

en: Ini berada di depan seluruh tingkatan.
vi: This will be in front of the whole batch.

en: Itu lebih mudah. Kawan-kawan kita saja.
vi:
That will be easier.
 It's just our friends.

en: Sebab itulah aku tak nak. Faham?
vi: I don't want to because they are our friends, you know?
-What if they make fun of me? -Hey.
Why would they make fun of you?

en: Aku layak duduk di belakang sahaja.
vi: I should only stay in the crowd.
Ja, even if you feel that way,

en: bagi aku, aku nampak kau menyerlah.
vi: for me, I see you shining so bright.

en: Aku nak semua orang nampak kau macam aku.
vi: And I want everyone to see you the way I do.

en: Saya dengar banyak rungutan daripada para guru.
vi: I heard many complaints from the teachers.
The students in your batch are getting out of hand.

en: Kamu ingat kami tak tahu dan tak perasan?
vi: Do you think we don't know what you're doing?

en: Maaf, cikgu. Saya akan beritahu mereka…
vi: -Sorry, sir. I'll tell them-- -Don't let me get to them first.

en: Jangan biar saya yang beritahu mereka.
Saya yang tandatangan sijil Ketua Pelajar kamu.
vi: I signed your Head Prefect certificate.
Don't try to mess with me.

en: Para guru kata kamu semua sudah melampau.
vi: The teachers said you guys are getting out of hand.
Do you want to get in trouble?

en: Kali pertama kumpulkan pelajar, sepuluh saja datang.
vi: I've never gathered the whole batch, but only ten people showed up.
That's normal. They're hanging out with their friends.

en: Kita tiada banyak masa di sini.
vi: We don't have much time here anymore.
-What's wrong with you? -I'm sorry, I didn't see you.
I'm sorry, I didn't see you.

en: Apa kata kita menyelinap keluar dan main snuker?
vi: What if we sneak out and play some snooker?

en: Ada berbual dengan Aizat baru-baru ini?
vi: Have you talked to Aizat recently?

en: Aku rasa dia nak beritahu kau sesuatu.
vi: I think he has something to tell you.

en: Nanti kau jumpa dia, tanyalah dia.
vi: Just ask him when you see him.

23 DAYS UNTIL SPM
 Peace be upon you, Aaidaa.
Peace be upon you too, Hilmi.

en: Kenapa kau nak jumpa aku di sini?
vi: Why did you want to meet me here?

en: Aku tak tahu macam mana nak cakap, tapi…
vi: I don't know how to say it, but…

en: Sudi hadiri majlis makan malam dengan aku?
vi: Would you like to go to dinner night with me?

en: Tapi kita semua akan pergi, bukan?
Tak. Maksud aku, duduk atau lepak dengan aku?
vi: No, I mean, sit with me or hang out with me?

en: Tak perlu buat semua ini, Hilmi.
vi: We don't need all this, Hilmi.

en: Tak, aku buat ini untuk kau.
vi: No, I made this for you.
Will you sing with my band

en: ♪ Majlis makan malam Tingkatan lima dengan aku ♪
vi: On Form 5 dinner night with me
I'm willing to wait one whole week

en: Di mana aku nak letak muka, Botol?
vi: Where can I hide my face now, Botol?

en: ♪ Sanggupkah kau hadiri Majlis makan malam dengan aku? ♪
vi: Will you go to dinner night with me?
What kind of joke is this, doofus?
I want to talk to you properly.
It happened just like that, Mi.

en: Aku tak berniat nak rampas dia. Aku tak berniat…
vi: I didn't mean to steal her. I didn't mean to--

en: Kau yang cari masalah dengan aku!
vi: You were the one who messed with me!
Alisha, do you have a hair dryer?
It's with Tasha. You can use it.
I never dress up like this.

en: Daa, kalau aku setuju untuk menyanyi malam ini,
vi: Daa, if I can agree to sing tonight,

en: kau kena setuju untuk berdandan malam ini, okey?
vi: you have to agree to dress up tonight, okay?
You didn't ask Sara to come with you?

en: Nanti kena tolak macam Hilmi. Buat malu saja.
vi: I don't want to be rejected like Hilmi. It's such a shame.

en: Gadis cantik macam kau takkan datang seorang diri?
vi: What's a pretty girl like you doing here all alone?
This is going to be tough.

en: Sebab kau amat cantik malam ini.

vi:
Thank you.
 Can I have one?
Since when did you start smoking?
Zaim, Pawang is waiting for you. Hurry up!

en: Saya akan pasang mikrofon di sini.

vi: Sir, look at the camera and smile.
Peace be upon you and greetings to everyone.

en: kepada semua guru dan pelajar STIA.
Baik. Okey, saya takkan beri ucapan panjang malam ini.
vi:
All right.
 Okay, I won't give a long speech tonight.

en: Sebab malam ini malam kamu semua, bukan?
vi: Because tonight is your night, am I right?

en: Jadi nikmati makanan ini, nikmati persembahan
vi: So, enjoy the food, enjoy the performance

en: oleh kawan-kawan kamu di sini, okey?

vi: I hope you all have fun, okay?
Remember, SPM is just around the corner.

en: Apabila terleka, yang pandai akan jadi bodoh.
vi: When you're idle, the smart will become stupid.

en: Yang bodoh akan memalukan sekolah, bukan?
vi: The stupid will humiliate the school, right?

en: Terima kasih, Tuan Awang, atas ucapan bersemangat itu.
vi: Thank you, Sir Awang, for your rather enthusiastic speech.

en: Sekarang, saya ingin menjemput KP kita
vi: Now, I invite our Head Prefect,

en: Dipersilakan penyanyi jemputan kita malam ini.
vi: Let's welcome our guest singer tonight.
I know that your days are gray
In the play of your thoughts Everything is confusing
It is clear in my eyes

en: ♪ Walau dari jauh ku nampak kau indah ♪
vi: Even from afar, you look beautiful to me…

en: Ada banyak lagi persembahan untuk semua malam ini.
vi: We have a lot more in store for you tonight.

en: Tapi atas permintaan kapten kita, Aizat Abdullah,
vi: But as per the request from our captain, Aizat Abdullah,

en: ada seseorang yang istimewa akan membuat persembahan malam ini.
vi: we have someone special performing tonight.
O Captain, my Captain, Aaidaa Zubir!

en: Tiba masa untuk mereka nampak apa yang aku nampak.
vi: It's time for them to see what I've seen.

en: ♪ Kau akan sedar dunia tak seindah rupa ♪
vi: You will realize The world isn't as beautiful as it seems
Although this self is not appreciated

en: ♪ Aku tahu aku masih punyai mimpi ♪
vi: I know I still have dreams

en: ♪ Tak kira apa saja dugaan yang melanda ♪
vi: No matter what challenges That come our way

en: ♪ Tak ada yang bisa buat ku putus asa ♪
vi: Nothing can make me give up
We will realize this in the end

en: ♪ Tak kira apa saja dugaan yang melanda ♪
vi: No matter what challenges That come our way

en: ♪ Tak ada yang bisa buat ku putus asa ♪
vi: Nothing can make me give up
We will realize this in the end
We will realize this in the end
Why do you hate me so much?

en: Selama lima tahun aku melindungi kamu,
vi: For five years I've protected you,

en: Tiba-tiba, kamu tak kisah tentang aku.
vi: Suddenly, you don't care about me.

en: Pergi mati dengan Projek Anchor kau!
vi: Go to hell with your Project Anchor!

en: Aku tahu aku dah banyak buat salah kepada kau.
vi: I know I've been a bad friend.

en: Sekarang, buatlah apa yang kau nak kepada aku.
vi: You can do whatever you want to me.

en: Aku akan hiburkan kamu dengan lagu lain.
vi: I will entertain you with another song.
So even during the SBP Trial,
This is all because of Aizat, sir.

en: Dia yakinkan semua orang untuk buat begini.
vi: He convinced everyone to do this.

en: Reputasi STIA boleh hancur disebabkan dia.
vi: STIA's reputation could be destroyed because of him.

en: Saya akan uruskan hal ini mulai sekarang.
vi: I'll handle this from now on.

en: Habiskan merokok dan sertai yang lain.
Ada apa-apa yang kamu nak beritahu saya?
vi: Is there anything you want to tell me?

en: tiada apa yang boleh lari daripada saya.
Ini sekolah saya. Saya tahu semuanya.
vi: This is my school. I know everything.

en: Saya nak kamu ingat satu perkara saja, Aizat.
Saya bukan kawan kamu, saya tak buat untuk kamu.
vi: I'm not your friend. I'm not doing this for you.

en: Apabila Aaidaa bersedia, dia beri isyarat
vi: When Aaidaa is ready, she will signal the hall

en: dan beri jawapan dalam kiraan lima.
vi: and she will give the answers in fives.

en: Keputusan hari itu bagus. SPM pasti tiada masalah.

vi: -You won't have problems with SPM. -Good thing I have Aaidaa.

en: Baguslah. Berbaloi ayah bela dia selama ini.
vi: Good then. Makes it worth it to keep her all this time.

en: Aku tahu kau yang beritahu Pawang.

vi: SSG teachers will be the invigilators for STIA.

en: Aaidaa buat tak dapat apa pun.
vi: Aaidaa did all that for nothing.

en: Dia buat sebab nak tolong kita.
vi: She did it to help our batch.
Help our batch or help Aizat?
you won't ruin the whole batch, right?
